sense.def:
To jerk something
pomeni nekaj nenadoma in s silo potegniti ali premakniti.

seg.quote: He jerked the boy savagely to his feet.
The door of the van was jerked open.
He jerked his head around to stare at me.
The man pulled the girl back with a jerk.

sense.def:
To jerk in a particular direction or in a particular way
pomeni z nenadnim in hitrim gibom nekaj premakniti v določeno smer ali na določen način.

seg.quote: Jerking suddenly awake, he lay very still and listened.
